channel.title: üè¢ University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Cascade Speculative Drafting for Even Faster LLM Inference
item.description: Cascade Speculative Drafting (CS Drafting) dramatically speeds up large language model inference by using a multi-stage drafting process, optimizing both time allocation and autoregressive generation.

item.title: Decision-Making Behavior Evaluation Framework for LLMs under Uncertain Context
item.description: New framework reveals LLMs’ human-like decision-making tendencies but highlights significant variations and biases influenced by demographic factors, underscoring ethical deployment needs.

item.title: DeepDRK: Deep Dependency Regularized Knockoff for Feature Selection
item.description: DeepDRK, a novel deep learning approach, significantly improves feature selection by effectively balancing false discovery rate and power, surpassing existing methods, especially with limited data.

item.title: InstructG2I: Synthesizing Images from Multimodal Attributed Graphs
item.description: INSTRUCTG2I: a novel graph context-conditioned diffusion model, generates images from multimodal attributed graphs, addressing challenges in graph size, dependencies, and controllability.

item.title: KG-FIT: Knowledge Graph Fine-Tuning Upon Open-World Knowledge
item.description: KG-FIT boosts knowledge graph embedding by smartly integrating open-world knowledge from LLMs, achieving significant performance gains.

item.title: Persistent Test-time Adaptation in Recurring Testing Scenarios
item.description: Persistent Test-Time Adaptation (PeTTA) prevents AI model collapse in recurring scenarios by dynamically adjusting the adaptation strategy based on divergence from the initial model, ensuring long-ter…

item.title: Robust Neural Contextual Bandit against Adversarial Corruptions
item.description: R-NeuralUCB: A robust neural contextual bandit algorithm uses a context-aware gradient descent training to defend against adversarial reward corruptions, achieving better performance with theoretical …
